title: Expansion of a Taylor Series about x = 2

content.question: Let f be the function given by f(x)=ln(3-x) . The third-degree Taylor polynomial for f about x=2 is

choices.label: <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>+</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <mo>−</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4907@</annotation> </semantics> </math>
